Comment.val: /*Function to calculate portfolioValue, accrued Interes indirect_portfoliobase costs over a given period. */

Text.val: Todo create function to determine factor

SQL_STMT_U.val: delete pc_portfolio_amount a where a.pcpb_id in (select b.id from pc_portfolio_base b where b.instrument_id = ~1 and b.calc_date between to_date(~2, 'DD-MM-YYYY') and to_date(~4, 'DD-MM-YYYY') and b.pere_id = ~3) and a.pcca_id not in(~5, ~6)
